channel.title: [PI]balmung wrong worn and attack anims[PI] Cmon someone please help me
channel.description: ok, i just added balmung to my server and its working fine i can spawn it and wield it but the worn and attack anims are wrong, i want it to wield like the new dh axe and attack like it to, where could i change that?

item.title: [PI]balmung wrong worn and attack anims[PI] Cmon someone please help me

item.description:
@dun_dun_dun wrote:

dude ive tried for 3 hours strait, i really need help ive tried everything i know to to and it still doesnt work

Read full topic

item.title: [PI]balmung wrong worn and attack anims[PI] Cmon someone please help me
item.dc:creator: @dun_dun_dun dun dun dun
item.description:
@dun_dun_dun wrote:

ok,hold on,

Heres dharok : Note this one is under ‘public void getPlayerAnimIndex(String weaponName){’ without the ’ 's and the dharok axes code was already there, nothing edited.

} if(weaponName.contains("dharok")) { c.playerStandIndex = 0x811; c.playerWalkIndex = 0x67F; c.playerRunIndex = 0x680; return;

Heres balmung: Note, this one is under ‘switch(c.playerEquipment[c.playerWeapon]) {’ without the ’ 's

case 14962 c.playerStandIndex = 2065; c.playerWalkIndex = 2064; c.playerRunIndex = 1664;

ive tried adding balmung right after dharok and with the same text but different anims and still nothing.
this one is under public int getWepAnim(String weaponName) { and heres the code:

if (weaponName.contains("balmung")) { return 4718; }
and thats the same one as dharoks axe has underthere

Read full topic
